== Factorial ==

_Note: recursive functions require 'my'._

{{{
my.fact = {|x|
        true? x == 0, 1, { x * fact(x - 1)}
}

p fact 5
}}}

== Fibonacci ==

{{{
my.fibonacci = { |x|
        true? x == 0,
                0,
                { true? x == 1,
                        1,
                        {
                                fibonacci(x - 1) + fibonacci(x - 2)}};
                        }

p fibonacci 10
}}}


= Extending Objects =

== Convenience == 

{{{
array.first = { my[0] }
array.rest = { my[1,-1] }

p [1,2,3].first
p [1,2,3].rest
}}}

== Let's get functional? ==

{{{
#Assume first and rest defined as above
array.map = {|f|
        true? my.length <= 0,
                {[]},
                { true? my.length == 1, {[f my.first]}, {[f my.first] + my.rest.map ->f} }
}

p [1,2,3].map({|x| x + 1})
}}}
